This is a sample document for testing OCR functionality.

It contains multiple lines of text that should be extracted accurately.

The document includes:
- Simple text paragraphs
- Lists and bullet points
- Various formatting elements

Table Example:
Header 1    Header 2    Header 3
Data 1      Data 2      Data 3
Row 2 A     Row 2 B     Row 2 C

This text should be processed with high confidence levels.

Special characters: àáâãäåæçèéêëìíîïñòóôõöøùúûüý
Numbers: 1234567890
Punctuation: !@#$%^&*()

End of sample document.
